message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some more money. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down to $112, but that's my final offer.  This product is truly worth more, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I'm really trying to make this work.  I'm going to come down to $110, but this is my absolute final offer.  I'm sure you'll find this product is well worth it.
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
